content: When AI engineering, practice test-driven prompting by writing tests first and having the AI implement the code.

payload.content: A checklist for graduating a project from AI-assisted development includes exporting code to GitHub, setting up a local development environment, reading and understanding existing code, adding tests for current behavior, refactoring incrementally, and establishing CI/CD and code review.

name: A checklist for graduating a project from AI-assisted development includes expor
content: A checklist for graduating a project from AI-assisted development includes exporting code to GitHub, setting up a local development environment, reading and understanding existing code, adding tests for current behavior, refactoring incrementally, and establishing CI/CD and code review.

payload.content: The key skill in modern software development is fluency in both 'vibe coding' and 'AI engineering' approaches, not choosing one over the other.

name: The key skill in modern software development is fluency in both 'vibe coding' an
content: The key skill in modern software development is fluency in both 'vibe coding' and 'AI engineering' approaches, not choosing one over the other.

payload.content: Vibe coding is like a self-driving car where you enter a destination and arrive, best for prototypes, internal tools, personal projects, and demos that won't be maintained long-term.

name: Vibe coding is like a self-driving car where you enter a destination and arrive,
content: Vibe coding is like a self-driving car where you enter a destination and arrive, best for prototypes, internal tools, personal projects, and demos that won't be maintained long-term.

payload.content: AI engineering is like driving with a co-pilot, where you remain in control and the AI assists, best for production systems, team codebases, and anything requiring security, scale, or longevity.

name: AI engineering is like driving with a co-pilot, where you remain in control and
content: AI engineering is like driving with a co-pilot, where you remain in control and the AI assists, best for production systems, team codebases, and anything requiring security, scale, or longevity.

payload.content: The golden rule for using AI in coding is: 'Don't commit code you can't explain.'

name: The golden rule for using AI in coding is: 'Don't commit code you can't explain.
content: The golden rule for using AI in coding is: 'Don't commit code you can't explain.'

payload.content: If you can explain the code, the tool used to write it is irrelevant; if you cannot explain it, do not ship it.

name: If you can explain the code, the tool used to write it is irrelevant; if you can
content: If you can explain the code, the tool used to write it is irrelevant; if you cannot explain it, do not ship it.

payload.content: To build intuition on when to use each approach, vibe code your next personal project and AI engineer your next work feature, observing the strengths of each.

name: To build intuition on when to use each approach, vibe code your next personal pr
content: To build intuition on when to use each approach, vibe code your next personal project and AI engineer your next work feature, observing the strengths of each.

payload.content: The future of coding involves knowing when to use 'vibe coding' versus 'AI engineering' and being fluent in both.

name: The future of coding involves knowing when to use 'vibe coding' versus 'AI engin
content: The future of coding involves knowing when to use 'vibe coding' versus 'AI engineering' and being fluent in both.
